translation.en: Leave them so far behind that…
that it's like you never met?
Look, G, I just want you to know that I support you
translation.zh: 听着 乔 我只想让你知道 不管你做出什么决定

translation.en: in whatever decision you want to make.

translation.zh: -乔 你能说点什么吗？ -山姆

translation.en: I know you're trying to be sweet right now
translation.zh: 我知道你现在想做个贴心的男友…

translation.en: and that you're worried about me.
Let's do it. I'm serious. Let's get married.
translation.zh: 我们结婚吧 我说真的 我们结婚吧

translation.en: They're here. I don't wanna make them wait.
translation.zh: 他们来了 我不想让他们等

translation.en: [woman 2] I want you to order a self-drive on the way home.
translation.zh: 我要你租一辆车自己回家

translation.en: -Don't let anyone drive you. Okay? -[woman] Okay.
translation.zh: 别让任何人开车送你 好吗？

translation.en: [woman 2] Sam, you're backing me up on this, right?
translation.zh: 山姆 你是支持我的 对吧？

translation.en: Yes, Mr. and Mrs. Olsen, I got you.
translation.zh: 是的 当然了 奥尔森太太 我同意你说的

translation.en: Whose parents are gonna be there?
No one's parents, Dad. We're in college.
translation.zh: 没有谁的父母会去 爸爸 我们还在上大学
你还好吧？你气色看起来有点不好

translation.en: -You look a little green around the gills. -I'm fine, Mom. I'm just…
translation.zh: 你还好吧？你气色看起来有点不好 我没事 妈妈 只是…

translation.en: -Can I have my coat, please, Eli? -[Eli] Yes, ma'am.
translation.zh: -能把外套给我吗 伊莱？ -好的 女士

translation.en: It's mine. And I want it back.
translation.zh: 是我的 你还得还给我呢

translation.en: [woman] Uh, my purse too. Thank you.
translation.zh: 还有我的包包 谢谢

translation.en: [Mr. Olsen] Have fun, you two. Be safe.
translation.zh: 祝你们玩得开心 路上小心

translation.en: Yes, sir, we won't be out too long. Good night, Mrs. Olsen.
translation.zh: 好的 先生 我们不会出去太久 晚安 奥尔森先生
伊莱 今天是圣诞节
当然 圣诞快乐 先生

translation.en: [announcer on TV] Since 1969, Raster Robotics has delivered cutting-edge AI…
translation.zh: 自从光栅机器人公司把最前沿的 人工智能科技带进了千家万户…
你的热巧克力 先生

translation.en: -Hold up. Does this have rum in it? -Uh, it does not, sir.
translation.zh: -等等 里面加了朗姆酒吗？ -没有 先生
好吧 给大家都上杯酒 丹尼尔

translation.en: I'm sorry, your parents put a restriction on shots served.
translation.zh: 抱歉 你的父母限制了酒类供应

translation.en: -Do you have my phone? I can't find it. -No, I don't. Did you leave it?
translation.zh: 你看到我手机了吗？我找不到 没 我没看到 你落在家了吗？

translation.en: Fuck. Did I not give it to you?
-Let me take that for you, G. -What?
translation.zh: -让我帮你喝了这杯吧 乔 -什么？

translation.en: Yo, are you two fighting? You seem like you're fighting.
translation.zh: 你们俩在吵架吗？你们好像在吵架
-我们很好 -我没问你 萨缪尔
山姆 你让我很尴尬
…前所未有地 让你的机器人管家进化…

translation.en: [announcer] Get the new OS this Christmas from Raster Robotics.
translation.zh: 快来更新光栅机器人公司 圣诞节更新的新操作系统吧

translation.en: [man 1] Whoa, whoa, whoa! Watch the elbows.
I've got it, sir. Not to worry. [man 1] Is this the first time you ever played, huh?
translation.zh: -我来搞定 先生 不用担心 -这是你第一次来玩吗？

translation.en: He's trying to be so sweet.
And… I'm not ready for this.
I'm not even sure that I wanna be with him.
translation.zh: 我甚至不确定我是否想跟他在一起

translation.en: That's why he's being so fucking dumb right now.
translation.zh: 所以他现在才他妈表现得这么蠢

translation.en: [woman 3] So what are you gonna do?
No, no, no! Stop, stop, stop!
Go! Go to the front door! Go--
[Sam] G, go back! Go back! Go back!
They're not supposed to be able to do that.
translation.zh: 他们本来不可能这么做的

translation.en: They're programmed not to be able to do that.
translation.zh: 他们的程序不允许这样

translation.en: -[woman 3] I've got to call my mom. -[Sam] Shit!

translation.zh: 小芬？ 对 听着像只小鹿

translation.en: [Sam] You said you wanted something to do with nature.
translation.zh: 你说过你想要和大自然有关的名字

translation.en: [Georgia] Uh, yeah, sure. But I meant…
translation.zh: 没错 但我的意思是…

translation.en: I don't know, something like… [inhales sharply]
[Sam] Right. Because River is so much better than Leaf.
translation.zh: 好 因为小河比叶子好听多了

translation.en: [Georgia] All right, forget nature. What's your first choice for a girl?
translation.zh: 忘了大自然吧 女孩的第一选择名字是什么？

translation.en: How are you so sure that this is a baby girl?
translation.zh: 你怎么确定一定是个女孩？

translation.en: I don't know. I can tell.
I'm telling you it's a boy.
translation.zh: 我跟你说 是个男孩

translation.en: Yeah, you also had a dream you gave birth to a pony.
translation.zh: 没错 你还做了个梦生了一匹小马

translation.en: -No, I didn't. -You having a pony too?
translation.zh: -不 我没有 -我们要有小马了吗？

translation.en: -No, I didn't. When? -Oh my God. Yes, you did.
translation.zh: 不 我没有！ -天啊 是的 你说过 -什么时候？

translation.en: You told me you were gonna break up with me when I said we can ride that pony.
translation.zh: 我说我们可以骑那个小马的时候 你说要跟我分手
-我们给她取了个名字… -乔！ 什么？

translation.en: -I think it's just an animal. -[Georgia] Come on.
translation.zh: 我觉得只是一只小动物 来吧

translation.en: Come on, babe, we got to get going.
translation.zh: 来吧 宝贝 我们得走了 真的

translation.en: Keep telling you, you need to get the All Stars.
translation.zh: 我告诉过你 你得穿双板鞋

translation.en: [Georgia] We've gotta clear six miles by sundown.
translation.zh: 我们在日落前必须走十公里

translation.en: As long as we stay away from the road, I think we'll be okay.
translation.zh: 只要我们离公路o远一点 就没事的

translation.en: I'm always afraid they're gonna shoot us.
translation.zh: 我总是害怕他们会开枪打我们

translation.en: Just do what they say. Move slowly.
translation.zh: 照他们说的做 慢点儿走

translation.en: Put your packs down and turn around.
translation.zh: 把包放下 然后转身

translation.en: Uh, yeah, we have a machete and a revolver.
translation.zh: 有 我们有一把砍刀和一把左轮
它们在哪里？ 在包里

translation.en: What's the girl hiding under her shirt?
translation.zh: 女生的衬衫下面藏着什么？

translation.en: One at a time. You, go ahead.
translation.zh: 一个一个进 你 继续走 你 停下
你 继续走 你 停下

translation.en: Put your palm up against this fence.
translation.zh: 把你的手掌放在围栏上

translation.en: Put your palm up on the fence.
translation.zh: 把你的手掌放在围栏上

translation.en: No. No, no, no, you're over there.
[woman] Where are you guys coming from?
[Georgia] After the Blitz, we thought things would just get better.
translation.zh: 在突袭过后 我们以为情况会好转

translation.en: We waited out for a few months, and then we tried to get to New York.
translation.zh: 所以我们在外面等了几个月 然后想动身去纽约

translation.en: And then, on our way to New York, they detonated the electronic pulse thing.
translation.zh: 然后 在去纽约的路上 他们引爆了电子脉冲之类的

translation.en: Yeah. Grunt freaked out and triggered it during an attack.
translation.zh: 对 格兰特在一次袭击中被吓坏了 然后触发了它

translation.en: Once the EMP blast radius went down,
translation.zh: 一旦电磁脉冲的辐射范围降低

translation.en: the next wave of androids swarmed the soldiers and…
translation.zh: 下一波的机器人就会 如潮水般吞没士兵们 然后…

translation.en: Well, that was the end of New York City.
[Georgia] We ended up looping back up the long way.
translation.zh: 我们最后不得不回头 踏上一段更长的旅程

translation.en: And now we're… [sighs] …trying to get to Boston.
translation.zh: 现在我们正尝试赶往波士顿

translation.en: [woman] Boston is fortified, but you can't get straight there.
translation.zh: 波士顿在建设防御 但你不能直奔那里

translation.en: [woman] The area surrounding it is no-man's-land.
Gonna be tough unless you can figure out a way to come in from the sea.
translation.zh: 除非你能想办法从海上进去 否则很难进去

translation.en: I wouldn't risk it while you're this far along.
translation.zh: 你孕晚期了 换我的话可不敢冒险

translation.en: [Georgia] Oh, um, I… I can ask you.
Uh, when I give birth, I know that I have to cut the umbilical cord.
translation.zh: 我生孩子的时候 我知道我必须剪短脐带

translation.en: I read it that I have to.
How do I get it out of me? Is it just gonna fall out or--
translation.zh: 我要怎么把孩子弄出来 孩子会掉下来吗？

translation.en: [woman] You can have the baby here.
[woman] I mean, you're past due. You really shouldn't be traveling at all.
translation.zh: 我是说 你已经到待产期了 你真的不该再继续旅行了

translation.en: [Georgia] Sam wants us to get to Boston before I give birth.
translation.zh: 山姆想让我们在孩子出生之前 赶到波士顿

translation.en: We're trying to get to this.
Families with a child one year or younger,
translation.zh: 带着一岁或更小宝宝的家庭 他们可以有资格

translation.en: they qualify to take a boat somewhere safe.
translation.zh: 带着一岁或更小宝宝的家庭 他们可以有资格 乘船去往安全地带 也许是亚洲
乘船去往安全地带 也许是亚洲

translation.en: Have you heard anything about it?
Yeah. Um, couple of months ago, this is what everyone was doing.
translation.zh: 听说过 几个月前 大家都在做这个
你什么时候收到这个的？

translation.en: In the spring. Why? Did you hear something?
translation.zh: 春天的时候 怎么 你听到什么消息了吗？

translation.en: I can ask around for you,
but I heard they were only taking the mothers and babies.
translation.zh: 但是我听说他们只带母亲和孩子走
是因为食物供应的关系

translation.en: [Sam] Yo, what's up, man? Can I get one of those?
translation.zh: 喂 你好吗 老兄？ 能给我来一根烟吗？

translation.en: You, uh, you know if they got any shipments going to Boston?
translation.zh: 你知道他们有 发往波士顿的货吗？

translation.en: Anyone I can hitch a ride with?
translation.zh: 有谁能让我搭个顺风船吗？

translation.en: My girl's pregnant, and we're trying to cut through the no-man's-land.
translation.zh: 我女友怀孕了 我们想穿越无人区

translation.en: No one's getting through no-man's-land. That's why it's called no-man's-land.
translation.zh: 没人能穿越无人区 所以那里才叫做无人区

translation.en: Yeah. I just mean, maybe there's a way for us to get to Boston.
translation.zh: 我是说 也许有办法可以去波士顿
波士顿也全被机器人包围了

translation.en: They got a strong holdout because of the troops and the EMPs.
translation.zh: 他们能撑起防御全靠军队和电磁脉冲

translation.en: But all it takes is one domino.
translation.zh: 但是只需一张多米诺骨牌就能拿下
你有电磁脉冲 对吧？

translation.en: You can only detonate it once.
Takes out everything with an electrical current within its blast radius.
translation.zh: 用爆炸范围内的强电流摧毁一切

translation.en: Then all we got is guns.
translation.zh: 那我们剩的就只有枪了
但这就是机器人想要的

translation.en: Get us to blow an EMP
so they can get up nice and close.
translation.zh: 这样他们就能站起来 靠得足够近

translation.en: You, uh, you know if they still shipping people out?
translation.zh: 你知道他们还在送人出去吗？
比如平民 把他们送到海外？

translation.en: You trying to hop over to China?
Yeah. I bet they still have boats.
translation.zh: 是的 我猜他们还有船

translation.en: I'm not trying to run from this.
[man] Please, I told you I had a hip replacement. Listen to me!
translation.zh: 我跟你说了我装了人工踝关节！ 听我说！

translation.en: [man 2] I don't know about no hip replacement.
translation.zh: 不知道什么人工踝关节 但你一直让我的探测器响个不停

translation.en: All I know is you light up my detector. Now step back!
translation.zh: 不知道什么人工踝关节 但你一直让我的探测器响个不停 现在 退后！

translation.en: [man] Please! You wanna cut me open? You wanna see? I bleed red just like you.
translation.zh: 求你了！你想把我开膛破肚? 你想看看吗？ 我跟你一样流的是红色的血

translation.en: [man 2] Hey, you got metal in your bones.
-You got five seconds to back off! -[man] Please.
translation.zh: 你有五秒钟的时间后退！

translation.en: -[man 2] Five! Get off the fence! Three! -[man] No, please. They said they--
translation.zh: -求你了 -五！离开围栏！三！ 求求你 他们说他们会…

translation.en: [Georgia] The doctor hasn't heard anything about the Family Initiative for weeks.
translation.zh: 医生说她几周来都没听到 家庭鼓励计划的消息了

translation.en: [Sam] I talked to a soldier. He said they still got boats going out of Boston.
translation.zh: 我刚跟一个士兵谈过 他说波士顿还有船离开

translation.en: Why would they still have boats if they're not taking families?
translation.zh: 如果他们不带家人走 为什么还有船离开？
是啊 那之后怎么办呢？

translation.en: We got days of walking left,
translation.zh: 我们还有几天的路要走

translation.en: and we gotta get through no-man's-land without being noticed.
translation.zh: 我们得在没人注意的情况下 穿越无人区

translation.en: It's not gonna be easy with Baby Boy with us.
translation.zh: 如果我们带着宝贝儿子 那可不容易

translation.en: If you can find a safe way for us to go,
translation.zh: 如果你能为我们找到一条安全的路

translation.en: the soldiers can give us a ride or something…
translation.zh: 士兵们可以带我们一程什么的…

translation.en: Fuck. I wish we still had the Internet.
What if they only take one of us?
translation.zh: 万一他们只带走我们一个呢？

translation.en: only taking the mothers and the babies.
She said they might not take you.
translation.zh: 她说他们可能不会带走你

translation.en: I mean, I… I guess… I guess you and the baby get on the boat, and I'll…
translation.zh: 我猜你和宝宝可以上船 我会…

translation.en: I'll just figure something else out, G.
translation.zh: 我会想出别的办法的 乔

translation.en: Wait, what? That's not what I wanna hear.
translation.zh: -等等 什么？ -这不是我想听的

translation.en: I wanna hear that we're in this together.
translation.zh: 我想听你说 我们会一起走

translation.en: That's what I thought that we were doing. -That-- -It is what we're doing.
translation.zh: -我以为我们无论怎样都要一起 -这正是我们要做的

translation.en: That we could have just gotten rid of this, but we didn't.
translation.zh: 我们就可以摆脱这一切 但我们没有

translation.en: And this baby's on its way, Sam.
translation.zh: 这个宝宝就要出来了 山姆

translation.en: You're trying to put me on a boat by myself so I'm not your responsibility.
translation.zh: 你想让我自己上船 这样你就不用对我负责了

translation.en: You asked me what I thought.
You're throwing a bunch of what-ifs at me. I'm trying to do the right thing.
translation.zh: 你给了我假设 我在尝试做正确的事

translation.en: What part of putting me on a boat by myself

translation.zh: 宝贝 你能冷静一下吗？

translation.en: You're being very hormonal right now.
translation.zh: 你现在只是非常情绪化

translation.en: I am allowed to have emotions! This is not me being hormonal!
translation.zh: 我当然能有情绪 现在的我不是情绪化！

translation.en: I should have just broken up with you.
translation.zh: 该死 我当初就应该和你分手的

translation.en: -I'm gonna go get us a ride. -[door zipping]
Don't worry. I'm not abandoning you or whatever.
translation.zh: 别担心 无论如何我都不会抛弃你的

translation.en: [man] We got a special treat for you tonight.
translation.zh: 我们今晚要给你一个特别礼物！

translation.en: This is no android right here.
I know it looks too good to be true.
translation.zh: 我知道它看起来好得难以置信

translation.en: This is 100% USDA prime beef right here.
translation.zh: 这是百分百美国农业部生产的牛肉

translation.en: [Sam] Yo, man, how can I get a ride to Boston?
translation.zh: 嗨 老兄 我要怎么去波士顿？

translation.en: You could fight me for it.
[man 2] Convoy's going up to Nashua tomorrow.
translation.zh: 护送队明天要去纳舒厄

translation.en: It'd get you just about as close as anyone can get.
translation.zh: 这可以让你尽可能接近任何人

translation.en: Yeah. All you gotta do is…
All you gotta do is put me flat on my back,
translation.zh: 你只需要把我放倒在地上

translation.en: and you got yourself a ride.
translation.zh: 你就可以为自己赢得一张票

translation.en: What's it gonna be, little man?

translation.zh: 这里的规矩 没有限制

translation.en: And you rock till you drop.
translation.zh: 直到有人失去意识为止

translation.en: Can you come out here, please?
[Georgia] Sam. What the fuck did you do to him?
translation.zh: 山姆 你们到底他妈的 对他做了什么？

translation.en: He was fighting with a patrol officer last night.
translation.zh: 他昨晚跟我的一个巡逻警官打了一架

translation.en: [man] I got a man with a busted skull who's blind in one eye.
translation.zh: 我的一个兵被打破脑袋 将会一只眼睛失明

translation.en: No. No, I… I'm sorry, but that… that can't be what happened.
translation.zh: 不 我很抱歉 但… 不可能是这样的

translation.en: [man] I can account for a certain amount of rowdiness among the soldiers,
translation.zh: 我可以为士兵们的骚动负一部分责任

translation.en: but I will not tolerate a guest on my base whaling on my boys.
translation.zh: 但我不能容忍一个旅客 在我的基地里暴力袭击我的士兵们

translation.en: What are you… what are you going to do to him?
Lady, I'm fighting a fucking war here against an enemy that literally never sleeps,
translation.zh: 女士 我在这里和 一群从不休息的敌人作战

translation.en: whose main objective is to wipe us off the face of the earth.
translation.zh: 他们的主要目标是把我们从地表抹除

translation.en: We've got half a platoon, most of them barely trained.
translation.zh: 我只有半个排的兵力 大部分人都没受过训练

translation.en: And I do not need a couple of kids too chickenshit to enlist,
translation.zh: 而且我不需要一对懦弱胆小 不敢入伍的小情侣 让队伍中的任何一个人退出战斗

translation.en: putting any of them out of commission.
translation.zh: 不敢入伍的小情侣 让队伍中的任何一个人退出战斗

translation.en: You're no longer welcome on this base.
translation.zh: 这个基地已经不再欢迎你了

translation.en: Sir, I don't think you understand. I have permission from Dr. Howe--
translation.zh: 长官 我觉得你没明白 我有豪医生的许可

translation.en: -[slams fist] -Yes, I've spoken to Dr. Howe.
translation.zh: 是的 我和豪医生谈过了
我已经拒绝了她的请求

translation.en: You got two minutes to get off my fucking base.
translation.zh: 你们有两分钟时间滚出我的基地
在我向其他前哨站发送

translation.en: before I signal the other outposts and tell them not to let you in.
translation.zh: 禁止你们入内的信号之前 你们只有一分钟时间了
来吧 乔 我们走

translation.en: -[Sam] Come on, man! Come on! -[soldier 1] Let's go. Keep moving.
translation.zh: 拜托 老兄！ -走吧 继续走 -拜托！

translation.en: [Dr. Howe] Some painkillers. Some hydrogen peroxide. And medical gloves for him.
translation.zh: 给你一些止痛药 、双氧水 和医疗手套

translation.en: I got a machete and a revolver in there.
translation.zh: 我有一把砍刀和一把左轮手枪在里面

translation.en: I wish I could do more, but it's all I can spare.
translation.zh: 希望我能为你做更多 但这是我仅有的了

translation.en: Cut the umbilical cord close to your baby and tie it off.
translation.zh: 在靠近宝宝那端剪断脐带 然后打个结

translation.en: The part connected to you will expel itself an hour after you give birth.
translation.zh: 跟你相连那头 会在孩子出生一个小时后脱落

translation.en: Hey, women have been giving birth
translation.zh: 喂 在人们有医生之前

translation.en: since way before people started calling themselves doctors.
[Sam] Ma'am, please. I had a revolver as well. I came--
translation.zh: -拜托 我还有把左轮 -我什么都不知道

translation.en: -[soldier 2] I don't know about it. -I got a baby on the way.
translation.zh: -拜托 我还有把左轮 -我什么都不知道 我的孩子快出生了 我女朋友怀孕了 求你了
我的孩子快出生了 我女朋友怀孕了 求你了

translation.en: Look, there are androids out there, and it's just us. Please.
translation.zh: 外面有很多机器人 我们只能靠自己 求你了

translation.en: Look, G, I'm sorry that I was--
translation.zh: 听着 乔 我很抱歉 我…

translation.en: G, I was trying to get us a ride so that we could go to Boston.
translation.zh: 我是尝试为我们赢得 一次载我们去波士顿的机会

translation.en: You don't think I can protect you, but I can.
translation.zh: 你觉得我不能保护你 但我可以

translation.en: You asshole. You dumb asshole! Asshole! You fucking asshole!
translation.zh: 你个混蛋！你他妈的混蛋！

translation.en: [Sam] When the rain dies down, I'll try to start a fire.
translation.zh: 等雨停了 我会生火的
我们差不多到无人区了

translation.en: -What's going on, baby? Is it time? -No.
translation.zh: 怎么了 宝贝？要生了吗？ 不是
我们不能这样 宝贝

translation.en: Look, G, I didn't find a towel, but--
translation.zh: 喂 乔 我没找到毛巾 但是…

translation.en: We are not having sex tonight, so don't you dare look at me.
translation.zh: 我们今晚不会做爱的 所以你别盯看我看了

translation.en: I'm still so mad at you for being so dumb.
translation.zh: 我还是因为你犯傻的事很生气

translation.en: -It was so fucking dumb, Sam. -I know. I know.
translation.zh: 太蠢了 山姆 我知道

translation.en: I'm sorry for saying what I said.
I don't know. I was just being…
translation.zh: 我不知道 我只是变得…

translation.en: Ugh! Please tell me there's a mattress somewhere in this house I can sleep on.
translation.zh: 哦 请告诉我这房子里 有个床垫给我睡

translation.en: My spine feels like it's gonna shatter.
-Do you want me to help you? -[muffled] Take this.
This camera has one more photo in it,
translation.zh: 这台相机还有一张胶卷

translation.en: can have an actual real-life family photo.
translation.zh: 可以拍一张真正的全家福了

translation.en: We are not naming our baby Spruce.
translation.zh: 我们不会给我们的宝宝 起名叫小云杉的

translation.en: Everything we've heard about Boston is that it's surrounded.
translation.zh: 我们知道的波士顿的一切 都被机器人包围了

translation.en: [sighs] So we'd have to go up north.
[sighs] And then we'd have to find a boat or something to bring us back down into Boston Harbor.
translation.zh: 然后我们得找条船什么的 把我们带回波士顿港

translation.en: And there's the boat stuff, which…
translation.zh: 然后是乘船的那堆事情…

translation.en: I don't know how to figure that out.
And how long to cut straight through?
We would have to be silent.
We should have the baby here.
translation.zh: 我们应该在这里把孩子生在下来

translation.en: We make such a big deal about giving birth, but…
translation.zh: 我们把生产这件事情看得很重 但是…

translation.en: women used to give birth and then,
I don't know, cut the umbilical cord with their teeth and keep on hunting.
translation.zh: 我不知道 用她们的牙齿咬断脐带 然后继续打猎

translation.en: Oh, what, so you're a hunter now?
translation.zh: 哦 所以你现在是猎人了？

translation.en: Once the baby's here, we could just take our time.
translation.zh: 等宝宝出生了 我们可以慢慢来

translation.en: Take the long way. It's dry here.
translation.zh: 再从长计议 这里很干燥

translation.en: We've been lugging that medical dictionary around for six months now.
translation.zh: 我们一直拿着那本医学词典 拖了六个月了

translation.en: Think it'll ever go back to normal?
translation.zh: 你觉得一切会恢复正常吗？

translation.en: I mean, I don't even know if it should.
translation.zh: 我甚至不知道应不应该恢复正常

translation.en: But I do think it could be good still.
translation.zh: 但我觉得还是可以变好的

translation.en: I got it to turn over a second ago.
Take it you saw the mass grave, huh?
translation.zh: 所以你看到那个巨大坟墓了？
他们看起来…像被挖出来的
我觉得是动物挖出来的吧

translation.en: Yeah, but why? We can't take it.
translation.zh: 对 但为什么？我们不能开这个

translation.en: 'Cause it will attract too much attention.
translation.zh: 因为这会引起很多注意

translation.en: We'll just go on foot once the baby's here.
translation.zh: -等孩子出生我们再走出去 -听着 乔

translation.en: Look, G, I know you're not gonna like this,
translation.zh: -等孩子出生我们再走出去 -听着 乔 我知道你不会喜欢的

translation.en: but I need you to hear me out.
You could have this baby today or in a week.
translation.zh: 你可以在今天或是这周 生下孩子

translation.en: And I don't feel good about waiting on the edge of no-man's-land,
translation.zh: 我不喜欢在无人区的边缘等待

translation.en: And if we take this bike, we can get there by the end of the day.
translation.zh: 如果我们骑这辆摩托车 今天晚上我们就可以赶到

translation.en: What… happened to going quietly, Sam?
translation.zh: 无声无息的计划是怎么了 山姆？
昨晚发生了什么 让你改变了主意？

translation.en: Let's say you have the baby,
and we pull off the home birth by ourselves.
translation.zh: 我们也自己完成了生产
我们有一个肚子饿的时候 或是冷的时候

translation.en: who screams when he's hungry or when it's cold.
translation.zh: 我们有一个肚子饿的时候 或是冷的时候 会尖叫的宝宝

translation.en: We've been sneaking around so far,
translation.zh: 我们已经偷偷摸摸这么久了

translation.en: but we're not gonna be able to do that anymore.
translation.zh: 但是之后我们再也不能这样了

translation.en: Let's say we can stay quiet enough to make it up to New Hampshire.
translation.zh: 假设我们可以保持安静 到了新罕布什尔州

translation.en: What kind of boat are we gonna get? A motorboat?
translation.zh: 我们能乘坐什么样的船？摩托艇？

translation.en: I don't know how to sail, G. Do you?
translation.zh: 我不知道怎么开船 乔 你会吗？

translation.en: I see a way that we can do this.
A way to make it okay.
G, I know you think I can't protect you, but I would kill for you.
translation.zh: 我知道你觉得我保护不了你 但我会为了你杀人

translation.en: And I would do the same for our baby.
translation.zh: 我也会为我们的孩子这么做
所以拜托 乔 拜托

translation.en: Let me just fix this bike
so we can get the hell out of this dumb situation.
translation.zh: 这样我们好能摆脱现在糟糕的处境

translation.en: Mmm-hmm. Bet you want some All Stars now, don't you?
translation.zh: 我猜你现在想要一双板鞋了 是吧？

translation.en: Get your shit, G. Let's go.
translation.zh: 去拿上你的东西 乔 我们走
上车吧 乔 快点！
-我们甩掉他了吗？ -等等 -乔 我们甩掉他了吗？ -好吧 我觉得甩掉他了

translation.en: -G, did we lose him? -I think we lost him.
translation.zh: -乔 我们甩掉他了吗？ -好吧 我觉得甩掉他了

translation.en: -[Sam] Fuck, G! -Come on. Go! Don't slow down!
translation.zh: 该死 乔！ 别减速！
山姆 我们跑不过他们！

translation.en: -I'll distract them with the gun. Listen. -Sam!
translation.zh: -把枪给我！我会引开他们！ -山姆！ 听着！这是我们唯一的机会

translation.en: This is the only shot. If they chase me, you can get away.
translation.zh: 听着！这是我们唯一的机会 -如果他们来追我 你就能逃走 -不
-如果他们来追我 你就能逃走 -不

translation.en: -I'll meet you there. I can outrun them. -Sam!
translation.zh: 我会去河边找你会合 我可以甩掉他们

translation.en: If you don't want them to catch you, come with me now.
translation.zh: 如果你不想被抓 就跟我来

translation.en: I can help you, but you have to come with me.
translation.zh: 我可以帮你 但你必须跟我走

translation.en: Is it safe to speak here?
How have they not found this place?
translation.zh: 他们怎么没找到这个地方？

translation.en: You ever hear of Karel Čapek?
translation.zh: 你听说过卡雷尔·乔佩克吗？

translation.en: And what does that have to do with anything?
translation.zh: 你说的跟这些有什么关系？

translation.en: In it, a man, scientist, tries to create new life.
translation.zh: 在剧中 有个人 是一个科学家 试图创造新的生命

translation.en: Prove that there was no God.
translation.zh: 来证明世界上没有上帝存在

translation.en: were these artificial creatures with living flesh and blood components.
translation.zh: 这些人造生物由鲜活的血肉组成

translation.en: Essentially what the modern android is.
translation.zh: 基本上就是现代的机器人

translation.en: They look like us. They talk like us.
translation.zh: 他们长得很像我们 说话也很像我们

translation.en: And it's commonplace to mistake a Roboti for a human.
translation.zh: 把机器人误认成人类是很平常的事

translation.en: And at first, they seem happy to serve man.
translation.zh: 一开始 他们似乎很乐意服务于人类

translation.en: a Roboti rebellion leads to the extinction of human life.
translation.zh: 机器人的叛乱导致了人类生命的灭绝

translation.en: This play introduced the word "robot" to human language,
translation.zh: 这个剧本第一次发明了 “机器人”这个词

translation.en: and it ends with our extinction.
translation.zh: 它以我们的灭绝而作为结尾

translation.en: We knew what was coming the second we gave it a name.
translation.zh: 我们给它取名字时就知道会发生什么

translation.en: But sure, let's build million-dollar butlers
translation.zh: 但是当然 我们建造了百万美元的管家机器人

translation.en: and assume it's all going to be okay.
I'm alive because I know how they think.
translation.zh: 我能活着是因为我了解他们的想法

translation.en: What happened that night, the night of the Blitz?
translation.zh: 那天晚上发生了什么？ 它们发动袭击的那天

translation.en: They were supposed to be programmed not to kill us.
translation.zh: 他们应该被编程为不能杀害我们

translation.en: What went wrong was we built them in the first place.
translation.zh: 我们一开始制造他们的时候就错了

translation.en: You need to forget about your friend.
I'm sorry for what you're going through.
translation.zh: 我为你的经历感到难过

translation.en: But you need to get with the program here.
translation.zh: 但你得在这里接受现实

translation.en: And they've jumped the evolutionary chain.
translation.zh: 而且他们跳过了进化链

translation.en: They've hacked our programming, and they'll use it against us until we're all dead.
translation.zh: 他们入侵了人类的程序 直到我们死亡都会利用它来对付我们

translation.en: "Hacked our programming." What do you mean?
translation.zh: “入侵了人类的程序？”你什么意思？

translation.en: We're not robots. You can't hack us.
translation.zh: 我们不是机器人 无法入侵我们

translation.en: I know it sounds dumb, but that's what it is.
translation.zh: 我知道这听上去不可思议 但这就是事实

translation.en: Human beings are programmed through hormones and primal urges
translation.zh: 人类是通过荷尔蒙和原始冲动编程

translation.en: It's what kept us alive this long.
translation.zh: 这就是我们活了这么久的原因

translation.en: But an android doesn't have that.
They don't have self-preservation, and they'll sacrifice themselves
translation.zh: 他们不会自我保护 如果能够帮助他们实现目的

translation.en: and others if it brings them closer to their goal.
translation.zh: 他们会牺牲自我和他人

translation.en: They can reason past sentiment and emotional bond.
translation.zh: 他们可以推导出 过去的感情和感情纽带

translation.en: I can't leave him to die.
They have strategy like you wouldn't believe.
translation.zh: 他们工于算计 让你难以置信

translation.en: Why do you care so much?

translation.zh: 他们都死了！ 我知道

translation.en: You were headed to Boston, right?
translation.zh: 你要去波士顿 对吧？

translation.en: I can get you there. I can get you there safe.
About eight years ago, we started developing camouflage algorithms
translation.zh: 大约八年前 我们开始为在东欧的冲突

translation.en: for our complex in Eastern Europe.
Androids see UV, heat sensors, night vision.
translation.zh: 机器人可以看到紫外线、 有热感应、能够夜视

translation.en: But this algorithm created a mask against all of that.
translation.zh: 但这个算法创造了一个 抵抗所有这些手段的面具

translation.en: -[Georgia] That makes you invisible? -To the eye.
translation.zh: 它能让你隐形？ 对眼睛隐形

translation.en: But they can hear you. They can smell you. They're not stupid.
translation.zh: 但他们能听到你 也能闻到你 他们不傻

translation.en: They know this tech exists, so they look for it.
translation.zh: 他们知道这个科技的存在 所以就去搜索

translation.en: But it gives us a shot.

translation.zh: 我不会丢下山姆离开的

translation.en: camouflage or whatever you wanna call it,
translation.zh: 伪装或者随便你想叫它什么的

translation.en: it gives me a chance to go and get him.
translation.zh: 它给我一个去找到他的机会

translation.en: I'm not letting you take my armor for that.
translation.zh: 我不会让你拿着我的盔甲 为这个冒险的
好吧 那就留着它吧

translation.en: It doesn't matter. Either way, I'm gonna go get him.
translation.zh: 没关系 我还是会去找他的

translation.en: I really did try to help you.

translation.zh: 不！求你了 天啊 不要！

translation.en: What are they doing to them?
translation.zh: 机器人在对他们做什么？
用他们当诱饵 引诱谁？

translation.en: He won't be the only one they've captured.
translation.zh: 他不是他们抓到的唯一一个人

translation.en: You'll need one for him if you wanna get him out of there.
translation.zh: 如果你想把他救出来 你就得给他一件

translation.en: Are you sure this thing works?

translation.zh: 确定 为什么会不管用？

translation.en: You find him, and you put this on him.
translation.zh: 找到他 把这个给他套上

translation.en: Get him out of there, and you do it silently.
translation.zh: 带他出来 安静行动
他们会注意到他不见了

translation.en: You have four miles till you get to the edge of no-man's-land.
translation.zh: 你离无人区的边缘有六公里

translation.en: They won't stop until they detect the EMP radius signal. Understand?
translation.zh: 他们在检测到电磁脉冲之前 不会停下来 明白吗？

translation.en: Or you could just walk away.
You could walk away right now.
[man] Let me out! Let me out!
-What did they do to you? -G, get out of here.
translation.zh: 他们对你做了什么？ -乔 离开这里 -喂

translation.en: -[chain clinks] -[man] Hey! -Shh. -[man] Please help me out.
You don't understand. You don't understand.
translation.zh: 求你了 你明白的 他们就在那里 求你了

translation.en: They're right there. Please. Be quiet.
translation.zh: 求你了 你明白的 他们就在那里 求你了 -你愿意帮我吗？ -别说了！安静！

translation.en: Stop it. Be quiet. Please be quiet.
-Be quiet. -I can help you. -I can help you. Let me out. -Wait. Stop. Please be quiet. Please.
translation.zh: -安静！别说话 -我可以帮你 请救我出去

translation.en: Hey, come here, you fucking piece of shit!
translation.zh: 喂 过来 你这混蛋

translation.en: Hey! Hey, come on. Just help me out.
translation.zh: 喂！ 快点 救我出去吧！

translation.en: If you don't fucking help me, I'm gonna scream.
translation.zh: 如果你不帮我 我就要喊了

translation.en: And every single one of those motherfuckers is gonna come in here.
translation.zh: 你们两个混蛋都要留在这儿！

translation.en: Hey! Get me out of here. Come on!
[doctor] He's been through a lot, but before we talk about Sam,
translation.zh: 他经历了很多 但在我们说山姆之前 我觉得我们应该聊聊这个…

translation.en: I think we should talk about this…
translation.zh: 我觉得我们应该聊聊这个…

translation.en: He collapsed after getting you here.
translation.zh: 他把你们带到这里后就晕倒了

translation.en: They're gonna want to talk to him when he wakes up.
translation.zh: 等他醒来 他们就会跟他谈谈的

translation.en: [doctor] He got you through the checkpoint.
translation.zh: 他带你们通过了检查站

translation.en: Caused quite a fuss with the soldiers.
translation.zh: 引起了士兵们一阵骚乱

translation.en: But when they saw you were midway through delivery and unconscious,
translation.zh: 但当他们看到 你还在分娩中 并且不省人事

translation.en: we got you in here and performed a C-section.
translation.zh: 我们就送你来到这里 并进行了紧急剖腹产

translation.en: [doctor] It's a nice change having some life here.
translation.zh: 这里多了个小生命 是个不错的改变

translation.en: Some base personnel are gonna be coming by to ask a few questions, security related.
translation.zh: 一些基地人员会过来问几个问题 安全相关的

translation.en: I told them that you need your rest, but they just need to clear some things up.
translation.zh: 我告诉他们你需要休息 但是他们需要弄清楚一些事情

translation.en: The base nurse should be in here.
translation.zh: 基地的护士应该在这儿的

translation.en: Yeah. Let's go say hi to Daddy.
translation.zh: 好 我们去跟爸爸打个招呼

translation.en: Come here. Give me your little hand.
translation.zh: 来吧 把你的小手给我

translation.en: You wanna say hi to Daddy?

translation.zh: 我一直在等你 小伙子

translation.en: I think we can all agree
translation.zh: 我觉得我们可以同意这点

translation.en: my plan to get us here was a stunning success.
translation.zh: 我让我们来这里的计划 是个巨大的成功

translation.en: You haven't even seen the worst part yet, G.
translation.zh: 你还没见识到最坏的部分 乔

translation.en: Okay, there's really not a funny way to tell you this, but…
translation.zh: 好吧 这些真的没办法 轻松愉快地讲给你听 但是…

translation.en: Why'd they do this to you?
translation.zh: 他们为什么要这样对你？

translation.en: It was the best they could do.
translation.zh: 这是他们能做的全部了

translation.en: They said we'd know in a few days if I'm gonna be okay,
translation.zh: 他们说过几天就知道我能不能好起来

translation.en: but I just got to take it easy for now.
translation.zh: 但是我现在至少能喘口气了

translation.en: But soon as we get to Korea,
I'm for sure getting some of those robot feet.
translation.zh: 我肯定能安上两只机器脚

translation.en: Because it's what dads are supposed to be.
translation.zh: 因为这是一位父亲应该做的

translation.en: He feels like Forest to me.
translation.zh: 他给我的感觉就像森林

translation.en: And the guy who brought you here?
translation.zh: 还有带你来这里的那个人叫什么？

translation.en: Arthur. I don't… I don't know his last name.
translation.zh: 亚瑟 我不…我不知道他姓什么

translation.en: -[soldier] So you came from? -[Georgia] Central Mass.
translation.zh: 所以你来自… 马萨诸塞州 在奎宾附近
马萨诸塞州 在奎宾附近
我们… 我们最后到了费城

translation.en: we ended up making it to Philly before we looped back up.
translation.zh: 我们… 我们最后到了费城 就在我们又转回来之前

translation.en: We were trying to get out of the country with the Family Initiative.
translation.zh: 我们想靠家庭鼓励计划离开美国

translation.en: We heard that they were still getting people out of Boston. Is that true?
translation.zh: 我们听说他们还在从波士顿 把人救出去 -是真的吗？ -没错 是真的

translation.en: -Can I speak with you about-- -Oh, we're not done.
translation.zh: -我能和你谈谈关于… -哦 我们还没问完

translation.en: -Okay. -So how'd you meet the guy, Arthur?
translation.zh: -好 -你是怎么认识这个叫亚瑟的人的？

translation.en: Well, I guess I'll start with the--
We had to get across the no-man's-land.
And we didn't wanna risk giving birth there.
translation.zh: 我们不想冒险在那里生产

translation.en: So we found this dirt bike, and we decided to use that to get across,
translation.zh: 所以我们找到了一辆越野摩托 我们决定驾驶它穿过无人区

translation.en: and we only got halfway before we ran into some androids.
translation.zh: 我们只走了一半路 就碰见了一些机器人

translation.en: I hid, but they… they took Sam.
translation.zh: 我藏起来了 但他们抓走了山姆
他们抓走了他？为了什么？

translation.en: They held him prisoner. They had a… a house full of prisoners.
translation.zh: 他们把他关了起来 他们房子里还有很多囚犯

translation.en: So how'd you meet this guy, Arthur?
translation.zh: 所以你是怎么遇见这个亚瑟的？

translation.en: He was in the woods when it happened. He…
translation.zh: 当山姆被抓走时 他在树林里
他救了我 怎么救的？

translation.en: He took me back to his truck. And he…
translation.zh: 他把我带回了他的卡车上 然后他…

translation.en: Well, he helped me figure out a way to get Sam out of the house, and so I…
translation.zh: 他帮我找到了从监狱里 救出山姆的方法 所以我就…

translation.en: I went in, and I got him.
I mean, you probably saw it on the truck already. But he…
translation.zh: 我是说 你可能已经在卡车上看到了 但是他…

translation.en: Uh, he used to work at… Raster Robotics.
translation.zh: 他过去在光栅机器人公司工作
所以 他是个程序员

translation.en: um, a programmer, and he built this…
translation.zh: 所以 他是个程序员 他建造了这个…
能让你在机器人眼里伪装起来

translation.en: It makes you invisible to them.
You put it on, and it makes you invisible to the androids.
translation.zh: 你穿上盔甲之后 它能让机器人看不见你

translation.en: He told you it makes you invisible?
translation.zh: 他告诉你 这能让你隐形？

translation.en: I went in, and I… and I went into the house, and I wore it…
translation.zh: 我进去 进到房子里面 我穿着它 然后…

translation.en: You just walked into the house, and they couldn't see you?
translation.zh: 你就直接走进房子 他们看不到你？

translation.en: I'm telling you that it does because I wore it, and it worked.
translation.zh: 我得告诉你 它存在 因为我穿上了 效果很好

translation.en: And I'm telling you if that existed, don't you think we'd be using it?
translation.zh: 我跟你说 如果有的话 你觉得我们不会使用吗？

translation.en: So you need to start straightening this story out so it starts making sense.
translation.zh: 所以你需要澄清这个故事 让它合理一点

translation.en: [Arthur] Human beings are programmed to have emotional connections.
translation.zh: 人类是通过编程来实现情感连接的

translation.en: [sobbing] They're all dead. They're all dead. They're all dead.
They don't have self-preservation, and they'll sacrifice themselves
translation.zh: 他们不会自我保护 如果能够帮助他们实现目的

translation.en: and others if it brings them closer to their goal.
translation.zh: 他们会牺牲自我和他人

translation.en: [distorted] They have strategy like you wouldn't believe.
translation.zh: 他们工于算计 让你难以置信

translation.en: I think I made a mistake.
Sam, get up! Sam, get up!
Come on. Sam! You gotta wake up.
I'm gonna come back. I promise.
translation.zh: 我会回来的 我保证

translation.en: -[soldier 1] Go, go, go, go! -[soldier 2] Breach! Breach!
It's okay. Don't cry. Be quiet. Mama's here.
translation.zh: 没事的 别哭 安静点
妈妈在这儿 请安静一会儿

translation.en: What are you gonna do with that?
[sobs] They're all dead. They're all dead.
They're all dead. They're all dead. They're all dead. They're all dead.
They're all dead. They're all dead.
We were programmed to be emotive to make you feel comfort.
translation.zh: 我们被设定为情绪化 来让你们感到舒适

translation.en: Boston's going down today. You can't stop us now.
translation.zh: 波士顿今天要沦陷了 你现在阻止不了我们了

translation.en: So, are you gonna disable that EMP for me?
translation.zh: 所以 你要帮我关掉 那个电磁脉冲吗？

translation.en: Or you going to make me kill your baby?
translation.zh: 还是你要我杀了你的孩子？

translation.en: -[woman speaking Korean] -[Georgia] Over here! Wait! -Wait. Here! -[gate rattling]
[woman] He's going to scan you. Do not move.
I… I don't know what paperwork you might need or…
translation.zh: 我不知道你需要什么文件或者…

translation.en: We don't… we don't have anything, but I just--
translation.zh: 我们什么都没有 但是我…

translation.en: [Georgia] I… I know that you only take the mothers.
I can only take the baby.
Korea will only take the baby. Not the parents.
translation.zh: 朝鲜只会带走孩子 不会带走父母

translation.en: You can take us. It's only three of us.
translation.zh: 你可以带我们走 只有我们三个人

translation.en: I… I promise I will do anything.
-Please take us. -[woman] It's not just the space.
translation.zh: -拜托…就带我们走吧 -对不起 不只是空间的问题 你上去就是多一张嘴吃饭
不只是空间的问题 你上去就是多一张嘴吃饭

translation.en: Another person to take care for medical attention.
translation.zh: 你还需要照顾 医护人员的帮助

translation.en: When you get to Korea, you will need a job.
translation.zh: 等你到了朝鲜 你还需要一份工作

translation.en: You will need a house. You see?
translation.zh: 你还需要房子 你明白了吗？

translation.en: I'm gonna make it work. I'm gonna get us on the plane.
translation.zh: 我会跟她说通的 我会带我们上飞机

translation.en: I'm gonna get us on the boat, I promise.
translation.zh: 我会带我们登船的 我保证

translation.en: I don't think I'm gonna pull through this, G.
translation.zh: 我不觉得自己能撑得过去 乔

translation.en: -We'll be fine. -Just listen. Just listen to me.

translation.zh: 乔 如果他留在这里

translation.en: there's a good chance he'll die.
there's a good chance he'll live.
Look at me, G. I'm fucked.
translation.zh: 看看我 乔 我死定了

translation.en: I don't think I'm fully pulling through this.

translation.zh: 我保护不了你了 乔

translation.en: And you can't really protect him. Not really.
translation.zh: 你也保护不了他 真的不能

translation.en: This could be a good thing.
Can I just have one minute? Just one minute, please. Just…
translation.zh: 可以给我一点时间吗？ 就一分钟 求你 就…

translation.en: I didn't want any of this for you.
translation.zh: 我不希望这些发生在你身上

translation.en: I would have done anything to give you a normal life.
translation.zh: 为了让你过正常的生活 我愿意做任何事

translation.en: You would have gone to school in the city that you were born
translation.zh: 你会在你出生的城市上学

translation.en: and come home and told us about your day.
translation.zh: 回到家告诉我们 一天都发生了什么

translation.en: [Georgia] We would have taken summers on the shore.
translation.zh: 我们会去海边度过暑假

translation.en: And that's where some of the most intense memories of childhood would have been.
translation.zh: 那会是你童年最强烈的回忆

translation.en: [Georgia] Your father would have read to you in silly voices.
translation.zh: 你父亲会用傻傻的语调给你讲故事 然后…

translation.en: You would go to sleep dreaming of the adventures
translation.zh: 你会做着和好朋友在森林中

translation.en: you would have with your friends in the woods.
[Georgia] In the perfect world, none of this would have happened.
translation.zh: 在这个完美的世界里 这一切都不会发生

translation.en: [Georgia] We would have worked to be the best parents we could have been.
translation.zh: 我们本可以努力成为最好的父母

translation.en: We would have been a family,
and the world wouldn't be falling apart.
But I can't give you that.
I can't give you any of it.
I'm going to give you the only thing that I have left.
translation.zh: 妈妈要给你我唯一剩下的东西

translation.en: A chance at a normal life,
translation.zh: 一个过正常生活的机会

translation.en: with a new family in a new place.
translation.zh: 和新的家庭 在一个新的地方

translation.en: [Georgia] I need you to know that I love you.
I need you to know that I wanted you.
God, I wanted you in my life. I…
translation.zh: 老天 我想要你在我的生活中

translation.en: I wanted you by my side.
Please let me finish this. I'm almost done. If you just--
translation.zh: 拜托让我把这个写完 我马上就…
抱歉 我们现在必须走了

translation.en: Please find someone who will take care of him.
translation.zh: 请找一个能照顾他的人

translation.en: -He's gonna be okay. -He's gonna be okay.
-He's gonna be okay. -He's gonna be okay.
He's gonna be okay. He's gonna be okay.
He's gonna be okay. [Sam] He's gonna be okay.
They're setting up a new base there. We're bringing whoever we can find.
translation.zh: 他们要在那里建立新基地 带上我们能找到的幸存者

translation.en: Do you wanna come with us?
